name: South Belfast Foodbank
description: Foodbank based in South Belfast who are supported by the Trussell Trust. They take financial donations as well as food and take volunteers.

name: South-West Belfast Foodbank
description: They provide three days’ nutritionally balanced emergency food and support to local people who are referred to us in crisis. They are part of a nationwide network of foodbanks, supported by The Trussell Trust, working to combat poverty and hunger across the UK

name: North Belfast Foodbank
description: Based in North Belfast, supported by the Trussell Trust. They provide three days’ nutritionally balanced emergency food and support to local people who are referred to us in crisis.

name: The People's Kitchen Belfast
description: Once a soup kitchen this foodbank now does homeless outreach, food parcels as well as hot food and drinks. They take financial donations as well as food, toiletries, clothes

name: Walk INN Community Project
description: This group believe that different homeless groups have different needs and aim to meet them. They take financial donations to go towards thair aims
